channel.title: [667-700] How can i make npc's talk? [REP++] ~Impactz

item.title: [667-700] How can i make npc's talk? [REP++] ~Impactz
item.dc:creator: @Impactz Impactz
item.description:
@Impactz wrote:

As the title says, how can i make a npc talk when you click ‘Talk-to’?

I have this atm.

[code]
package com.rs.game.player.dialogues;
public class Max extends Dialogue {

private int npcId;

@Override
public void start() {
	npcId = (Integer) parameters[0];
	sendEntityDialogue(SEND_2_TEXT_CHAT,
			new String[] { NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
					"Hello there, my name is Max, sorry but,",
					" im bussy at the moment, ill talk to you later!" }, IS_NPC, npcId, 3373);
}

}[/code]

Im trying it with the npc named ‘Max’ (id=3373)
Am i getting any closer to something :s?
(I have no errors when compiling, and it doesn’t work ingame)

Read full topic
item.source: [667-700] How can i make npc's talk? [REP++] ~Impactz
